1.title: Screenplay for Death

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Helen Golay, 74, and Olga Rutterschmidt, 72, killed a down-on-his-luck, temporarily homeless screenwriter, Kenneth McDavid, 50, and made the murder look like a hit-and-run in order to collect on a multi-million dollar life insurance policy. Incredibly, when police investigated the case, they found out Golay and Rutterschmidt had committed the exact same crime 6 years earlier!

2.title: Child Actor Killer

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Skylar Deleon (25) was a former child actor with a string of successes - 10 commercials and a role on Mighty Morphin' Power Rangers. Years later, after realizing his career was heading nowhere, he turned to a life of crime. Skylar became infamous for murdering a retired couple, Tom and Jackie Hawks, while pretending to buy their 55-foot yacht.

3.title: The Movie That Helped Catch a Killer

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Nick Markowitz (15) was kidnapped and murdered because of a feud over drug money between Nick's half-brother Ben Markowitz (22) and suburban drug dealer Jesse James Hollywood (21). Four years later, Hollywood director Nick Cassavetes made a film based on the case, Alpha Dog, with an all-star cast, including Bruce Willis, Emilie Hirsch and Justin Timberlake.

4.title: Robert Blake: Killer

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: On May 4, 2001, Bonny Lee Bakely (44)-the wife of actor Robert Blake (68)-was fatally shot while sitting in Blake's parked car outside an Italian restaurant. In 2002, Blake was charged with Bakely's murder, but in March 2005, a jury found Blake not guilt. Then, seven months later, Blake was found liable in a wrongful death lawsuit brought against him by Bakely's children. Bakely's murder remains unsolved.

5.title: Movie Theater Massacre

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The Silent Movie Theatre is a beloved Hollywood institution-the only movie theater in the world devoted exclusively to silent movies. But it was also the site of a horrific murder: its owner, Laurence Austin (74) was shot in the face with a .357 at close range by Christian Rodriguez (19), a hitman hired by Austin's lover (and the theater's projectionist) James Van Sickle (34) during a screening of Austin's favorite silent movie, Sunrise.

6.title: Death of a Hollywood Publicist

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: While driving home from a movie premiere, Hollywood publicist Ronni Chasen, 64, was murdered (shot 4 times) by convicted felon Harold Martin Smith, 43, under mysterious circumstances-the case was officially closed but conspiracy theories still linger because the killer shot himself and no clear motif was ever established.

7.title: Audition for Death

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Serial sexual predator Victor Paleologus, 53, bound and fatally strangled aspiring actress Kristi Johnson, 21, after luring her to a secluded spot by posing as a talent scout for the next James Bond film.

8.title: Slaughter on the Studio Steps

episode of.title: Demons in the City of Angels (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Legendary Hollywood screenwriter Robert Lees (91) survived being blacklisted in the fifties, only to be brutally murdered in the middle of the night by a transient, homicidal maniac, Keven Lee Graff (27). Graff stabbed Lees 41 times, then removed his heart, head, and genitals. That morning, Graff took Lees' severed head to the home next door where he committed a second murder, fatally stabbing Dr. Morely Engleson (69). Graff was arrested the following day and eventually pleaded guilty to both murders although he claimed no memory of the crimes.

imdb.plot outline: Los Angeles provides a dazzling landscape built on the hopes and dreams of those who risked everything for their shot in show business but demons also dwell in the City of Angels, lurking beneath the glitz and glamour are cold-blooded killers and shocking crime scenes.
imdb.title: Demons in the City of Angels
